00047     PgOpt **getAlgorithmicOpts();

00058     
00059     // Do the clustering
00060     Clusters FitSNPGaussianPriors3(const IntensityMatrix &intensities, const Priors &priors);
00061 
00062     // Generate the matrix of probabilities of a sample being in a particular cluster (N samples x K clusters)
00063     void calculatePXI_ZJ(PXI_ZJMatrix *pxi_zj,
00064                          const Clusters &clusters,
00065                          const IntensityMatrix &intensities, size_t k);
00066 
00067     double calculateSNPSpecificCorrectionFactor(const IntensityMatrix &intensities,
00068                                                 const Priors &priors);
00069 
00070     // Amount to weight confidence factor determined by comparing most likely cluster to next most likely,
00071     // as compared to confidence factor determined by distance of sample from cluster mean.
00072     extern double relative_distance_confidence_weight;
00073 
00074     // After calculating clusters, ensure all weights are >= this
00075     extern double final_weight_min;
00076     
00077     
00078     // Calculate confidence factor based on distance of sample from cluster mean
00079     double calculateConfidenceRelativeToCluster(const Matrix2x2 &B,
00080                                                 const IntensityMatrix::ROW &intensities,
00081                                                 const IntensityMatrix::ROW &clusterMean);
00082 
00083     // Generate the B matrix that gets passed to calculateConfidenceRelativeToCluster
00084     Matrix2x2 makeBMatrix(const Matrix2x2::ROW &clusterVars, double covar);
00085
